statements: UPDATE wind_turbine_maintenance_schedule SET maintenance_cost = 1500.00, maintenance_type = 'Annual Inspection' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wind_turbine_maintenance_schedule SET maintenance_date = '2022-09-15', completed = true WHERE turbine_id = 102;
UPDATE wind_turbine_maintenance_schedule SET maintenance_cost = 5000.00, completed = true WHERE turbine_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Annual Inspection';
UPDATE wind_turbine_maintenance_schedule SET maintenance_type = 'Repair', maintenance_date = '2022-07-15', completed = false WHERE turbine_id = 102;
UPDATE WindTurbine SET location='Texas' WHERE turbine_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE WindTurbine SET energy_production = energy_production + 10, last_maintenance_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE turbine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE MaintenanceSchedule SET description = 'Bi-annual maintenance scheduled' WHERE turbine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
